Definition: Given an English-language product review, you must determine whether it is positive or negative. A positive review is one where the product's review has a positive tone. A negative review is one where the product's review has a negative tone.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: I bought these to use with my tablet so that when i go somewhere like a hotel room where the wifes not in bed and its too cold for me to use, i can put them on myself very comfortably. I keep one at work since I'm often cold. Love them. A friend told me about them; then decided she wanted some. She loves hers too. They really do help get things warm or cool.

I purchased this little converter for my Samsung 3D TV. It works great. The best part is that unlike other converters in it's price range - I can now receive all of the TV channels without having to hook up an extra antenna which was costing me $80/month before.
THIS IS NOT A GOOD PRODUCT IT DOSENT EVEN LAST MORE THAN 5 MONTHS OF VERY LIGHT USE. MAYBE I GOT DIRTY ONE BUT THEY ARENT MADE DURABLE AT ALL. WONT WASTE MY MONEY ON SAMSUNG ANYMORE!!!

it just was okay. kinda slow. did not hold my attention as i had hoped. i got bored with the plot line, too slow to read. no excitement. there were some good points though. well worth reading, for its message about war and it's effects on human nature. we would all do well, if possible, after reading this one, to stay away from that kind of warfare.but overall, just a bit long in parts I thought. could have done it more action packed too.

The product is good and I use it to make my hair silky smooth at the end of styling. Only reason this did not give 5 stars is because I wish the lid was easier to close and stay latched. But with that said, a very easy process for applying products such as this, which can be used on damp hair. The price can't argue about either!! Love it. Will definitely buy again. Great product.

The other reviews are pretty accurate with the story of how great this film is. It is a masterpiece. In fact, if I could, I would give it 4 stars. The problem is, you can't get the Blu-ray transfer anywhere. You have to wait for Netflix to put up its own release in September which will include subtitles. This should be remedied right away. I've asked amazon, and they refuse to provide one. My advice? Stay away from all streaming media until it's available on BD (or blu).

If you are looking for something natural this is the wrong brand! It seems diluted in its ingredient! But i would say the product does what they claim. The vendor was quick at delivery just not pleased with how it arrived. Will use till completed...
